articles.author: David Randall, Saqib Ahmed
articles.description: Michael Burry, the money manager made famous in the book and film "The Big Short," held bearish options against the broad S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 Index at the end of the second quarter, according to securities fillings released on Monday.
articles.title: Burry, famous for 'Big Short,' bought bearish options against S&P, Nasdaq 100

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Tesla (TSLA.O) introduced new standard range Model S and Model X cars in the United States, priced at $78,490 and $88,490, respectively, the electric carmaker's website showed on Monday.
articles.title: Tesla introduces new Model S and X cars in US

articles.author: Tetsushi Kajimoto, Kantaro Komiya
articles.description: Japan's economy grew much faster than expected in April-June, as brisk auto exports and tourist arrivals helped offset the drag from a slowing post-COVID consumer recovery, although global recession prospects cloud the outlook.
articles.title: Japan's Q2 GDP beats forecasts as exports zoom

articles.author: Luc Cohen
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried used money he stole from customers of his FTX cryptocurrency exchange to make more than $100 million in political campaign contributions before the 2022 U.S. midterm elections, federal prosecutors said on Monday.
articles.title: Bankman-Fried used $100 mln in stolen FTX funds for political donations, US says

articles.author: Helen Reid, Amy Tennery
articles.description: The unpredictability of the Women's World Cup, with the U.S. knocked out early and a first-time champion assured, is forcing major global marketers such as Adidas and Nike to move fast to adapt to shoppers' quick shifts in preferences and demand.
articles.title: As World Cup breaks records, Adidas, Nike navigate bumps in retail demand

articles.author: Jonathan Stempel
articles.description: Berkshire Hathaway (BRKa.N), the conglomerate run by billionaire Warren Buffett, on Monday disclosed new investments in the homebuilders DR Horton (DHI.N), Lennar (LEN.N) and NVR (NVR.N).
articles.title: Warren Buffett's company invests in three homebuilders even as rates rise

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Fulton County, Georgia, court's website briefly posted a document on Monday listing several criminal charges against former U.S. President Donald Trump that appeared related to his attempts to overturn his 2020 election defeat in the state, before taking the document down without explanation.
articles.title: Georgia court website briefly publishes, removes document about potential Trump charges

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China's July industrial output and retail sales growth slowed and undershot forecasts, adding to a raft of recent weak data, suggesting policymakers may need to step up support measures to shore up a faltering economy.
articles.title: China cuts key rates as industrial output, retail sales growth miss forecasts

articles.author: Hyonhee Shin
articles.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol said on Tuesday that an upcoming summit with the leaders of the United States and Japan will set a new milestone in trilateral cooperation in the face of North Korea's evolving nuclear and missile threats.
articles.title: South Korea's Yoon says summit with US, Japan a milestone in trilateral ties
